    • Uses of Account in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return Account 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Application.createAccount(Account account)
      Creates a new Account that may login to this application.
      Account Application.createAccount(CreateAccountRequest request)
      Creates a new Account that may login to this application according to the request criteria.
      Account Application.sendPasswordResetEmail(String accountUsernameOrEmail)
      Sends a password reset email for the specified account username or email address.
      Account Application.verifyPasswordResetToken(String token)
      Verifies a password reset token in a user-clicked link within an email.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account Tenant.verifyAccountEmail(String token)
